title: ‘We Plan on Winning It Again’: Ineos Grenadiers Bullish about Tour de France in Post-Brailsford Era
content:
New CEO John Allert insists GC racing remains the squad's North Star as he kick-starts mission to catch up to Visma-Lease a Bike, UAE Emirates.

Read the full article at ‘We Plan on Winning It Again’: Ineos Grenadiers Bullish about Tour de France in Post-Brailsford Era on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
